actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House that the President undertake discussions with the industrialized countries with a view toward developing a common approach to the grave problems facing today's international monetary system.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the House of Representatives that (1) the President recognize the severity of the international monetary crisis; (2) the President undertake discussion with the other industrialized countries to develop a common approach to this crisis; and (3) the approach should focus on a long-term solution to the crisis caused by exclusive reliance on the dollar as the key international monetary reserve asset.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House that the President undertake discussions with the industrialized countries with a view toward developing a common approach to the grave problems facing today's international monetary system.
